content:
You've got a great selection of games there! Ticket to Ride, Settlers of Catan, and Carcassonne are all modern classics that offer a great combination of strategy, social interaction, and fun.

Congratulations on your recent win in Ticket to Ride! There's nothing quite like the feeling of emerging victorious after a competitive game, especially when it's with coworkers.

It's great to hear that you've found a way to unwind and relax with your coworkers through board games. Playing games can be a great way to reduce stress and improve morale, and it's even better when you can do it with people you work with.

Two to three hours is a great amount of time to play games, too. It's long enough to get fully engaged in the games, but short enough to keep things fresh and prevent burnout.

Have you noticed any changes in your relationships with your coworkers since starting the game nights? Do you find that you're more comfortable communicating or collaborating with each other during work hours?

Also, have you considered introducing new games to your rotation? There are many great games out there that might appeal to your group, and it's always exciting to try something new!
